data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The Kinetic Molecular Theory states that kinetic energy and temperature are directly proportionate. Thus, a ____ in ____ will ____ in a double ____ kinetic ____ and ____ increase ____ velocity ____ a ____ of 1.4 ( ____ square ____ of 2, ____ the KE equation ). This means that the higher the temperature of a gas, the faster the individual particles in that gas are moving.
data.partBlankContent: The Kinetic Molecular Theory states that kinetic energy and temperature are directly proportionate. Thus, a dou___ in tempe______ will res___ in a double i_ kinetic ene___ and a_ increase i_ velocity b_ a fac___ of 1.4 ( t__ square ro__ of 2, s__ the KE equation ). This means that the higher the temperature of a gas, the faster the individual particles in that gas are moving.
data.answer: 分子运动理论指出，动能和温度成正比。因此，温度加倍将导致动能加倍，速度增加1.4倍(2的平方根，见KE方程)。这意味着，气体的温度越高，气体中单个粒子的运动速度就越快。
